verbs.description: enough fentanyl to [V: kill] [ARG1: 32 million people seized in queens] new york — agents made a record fentanyl bust in queens and seized an amount large enough to kill 32 million people officers seized nearly 270 pounds of fentanyl heroin and cocaine worth 30 million during separate busts law enforcement officials said monday they also arrested four people fentanyl queens
